data.name: EpiAttributeRemoverDescription
data.value: For Class Attribute: TemplateDescriptor, Argument Default will be removed.

data.name: EpiAttributeRemoverMessageFormat
data.value: Attribute Argument '{0}' will be removed

data.name: EpiAttributeRemoverTitle
data.value: CMS Attribute TemplateDescriptor will be updated

data.name: EpiClassUpgradeDescription
data.value: This class is no longer supported on CMS and will be replaced

data.name: EpiClassUpgradeMessageFormat
data.value: Class '{0}' will be replaced with '{1}'

data.name: EpiClassUpgradeTitle
data.value: CMS Classes like PartialContentController or BlockController will be replaced

data.name: EpiDisallowedTypesDescription
data.value: In CMS 12 override of PropertyData ParseToObject is no longer required. Functionality can be achieved by creating a new instance and calling the ParsToSelf method.

data.name: EpiDisallowedTypesMessageFormat
data.value: Type '{0}' Method override will be removed

data.name: EpiDisallowedTypesTitle
data.value: CMS 12 projects should no longer use overrides for ParseToObject

data.name: EpiDisplayChannelDescription
data.value: CMS Display Channels will be updated.

data.name: EpiDisplayChannelFormat
data.value: Argument 'HttpContextBase' will be replaced with 'HttpContext'

data.name: EpiDisplayChannelTitle
data.value: CMS display channels will be updated

data.name: EpiHttpContextBaseDescription
data.value: ServiceAccessor<HttpContextBase> in constructor will changed to HttpContextAccessor.

data.name: EpiHttpContextBaseFormat
data.value: ServiceAccessor<HttpContextBase> in constructor will changed to HttpContextAccessor

data.name: EpiHttpContextBaseTitle
data.value: ServiceAccessor<HttpContextBase> in constructor will changed to HttpContextAccessor

data.name: EpiMemberReplacementDescription
data.value: The Interface IFindUIConfiguration is no longer supported and will be replaced

data.name: EpiMemberReplacementMessageFormat
data.value: Interface '{0}' will be replaced with '{1}'

data.name: EpiMemberReplacementTitle
data.value: IFindUIConfiguration will be replaced with FindOptions

data.name: EpiObsoleteUsingDescription
data.value: Obsolete using statements should be removed.

data.name: EpiObsoleteUsingMessageFormat
data.value: Using statement {0} should be removed

data.name: EpiObsoleteUsingTitle
data.value: Commerce: Remove obsolete usings like Mediachase.BusinessFoundation

data.name: EpiPartialControllerDescription
data.value: CMS partial controllers will be updated.

data.name: EpiPartialControllerFormat
data.value: Method 'Index' will be replaced with 'InvokeComponent'

data.name: EpiPartialControllerTitle
data.value: CMS partial controllers will be updated

data.name: EpiPartialRouterDescription
data.value: CMS partial routers will be updated.

data.name: EpiPartialRouterMessageFormat
data.value: Method signatures will be updated

data.name: EpiPartialRouterTitle
data.value: CMS partial routers will be updated

data.name: MakeConstDescription
data.value: Variables that are not set after they are created should be marked as constant

data.name: MakeConstMessageFormat
data.value: Variable '{0}' should be marked const

data.name: MakeConstTitle
data.value: Replace obsolete Types and Attributes eg. TemplateDescriptor(Default)

data.name: MetadataAwareDescription
data.value: Convert IMetadataAware to IDisplayMetadataProvider.

data.name: MetadataAwareMessageFormat
data.value: Implementation of IMetadataAware will be replaced with IDisplayMetadataProvider

data.name: MetadataAwareTitle
data.value: Convert IMetadataAware to IDisplayMetadataProvider

data.name: TypeUpgradeDescription
data.value: This type is no longer supported on CMS and should be replaced.

data.name: TypeUpgradeMessageFormat
data.value: Type '{0}' should be replaced with '{1}'

data.name: TypeUpgradeTitle
data.value: CMS Types and Namespaces should be upgraded
